sentences.en: Better woo over the midden than over the moor.
sentences.cn: 愿嫁邻家男,不嫁外乡汉.

sentences.en: Connie: Patricia Woo is looking for a job now.
sentences.cn: 康妮: 帕特里夏•吴正在找工作.

sentences.en: Fallen flowers intends to woo flowing water, only to draw a blank.
sentences.cn: 落花有意随流水, 流水无心恋落花.

sentences.cn: 一是以宇达 、 安瑞 防爆 为主的加工制造业.

sentences.en: Five blocks Soapy travelled before his courage permitted him to woo capture again.
sentences.cn: 索比走过五个街口之后,设法被捕的气又回来了.

sentences.en: He attempts to woo her in a characteristically extravagant manner.
sentences.cn: 他尝试过用挥金如土的阔绰方式去取悦于她.

sentences.en: He is trying to woo my sister.
He was trying to woo the daughter of a Missouri aris - tocrat.
sentences.cn: 他正试图追求一位密苏里的豪门小姐.

sentences.en: His efforts to woo her to his side proved fruitless.
sentences.cn: 他试图说服她站到自己一边的努力徒劳无功.

sentences.en: Is this about that guy named Hwang Dae - woo?
sentences.cn: 是不是跟那个叫黄大宇的男人有关?

sentences.en: Kwon Sang - woo said'song Seung - heon is my only friend, fans please don't quarrel "
sentences.cn: 权相宇说:“宋承宪是我唯一的朋友, 影迷们别吵架了 ”

sentences.en: Margaret allowed herself to go through all sorts of indignities to woo the voters.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特为了争取选民,不得不忍受各种羞辱.

sentences.en: Steven, did you check up on Patricia Woo before you hired her?
sentences.cn: 史蒂文, 你雇帕特里夏.吴之前核对过她的材料 吗 ?

sentences.en: The young man came to woo.
This product will help to woo our customers away for our competitor.
sentences.cn: 这种产品有助于把我们的顾客从我们的竞争对手中吸引过来.
